It provides insights into various aspects of your codebase, including Code Vulnerabilities, Code Documentation, Bugs, Optimization techniques, and much more.
cliTools.packageInfo: This tool is available via our github app that will scan your entire repo for relevant files and create a vulnerability scan report for you and also raise a pull request that you can merge.
